DOC.criteria: Male female child eligible participation study : age > = 1 year ( 1st birthday ) 11 year ( last day 12th birthday ) screening ; parent / legal guardian provide write informed consent ; child provide write assent study accord age capacity understanding ; parents/guardians understand nature clinical study comply requirement protocol ( e.g. , completion Subject Diary , return followup visit ) ; generally healthy , ( i.e . physician would reservations vaccinate TBE vaccine outside scope clinical study ) ; provide negative pregnancy test result first medical examination ( subject female capable bearing child ) . Subjects exclude participation : history previous TBE vaccination ; history TBE infection ; history infection flaviviruses ; history vaccination yellow fever and/or Japanese B encephalitis ; history severe allergic reaction , particular know sensitivity allergy component vaccine ; suffer disease ( e.g . autoimmune disease ) undergo form treatment ( e.g . systemic corticosteroid ) expect influence immunological function ; receive blood product immunoglobulin within 90 day prior study entry ; know Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) positive ( HIV test require specifically purpose study ) ; functional surgical asplenia ; rash dermatological condition injection site could interfere injection site reaction evaluation ; administer investigational product within six week prior study start concurrently participate another clinical study include administration investigational product ; pregnant breastfeeding ( female subject ) ; parents/legal guardian ( ) dependent relationship study investigator study team member . Dependent relationship include close relative ( i.e. , child grandchild , partner/spouse , sibling ) well employee investigator site conducting study . Subjects acute illness without elevate body temperature ( > =37.5°C ) within 3 day prior schedule first vaccination vaccinate . Subjects may include repeat visit provide ( 1 ) illness resolve ( body temperature < 37.5 °C ) , ( 2 ) repeat visit 14 calendar day Screening Visit , ( 3 ) center still open recruitment . If subject receive antipyretic within 4 hour prior schedule time vaccination , vaccination perform later date , long center still open recruitment . Subjects receive live vaccine within 4 week inactivate vaccine within 2 week prior schedule first study vaccination vaccinate interval 4 2 week , respectively , pass , provide center still open recruitment . If subject bitten tick within 4 week prior schedule first second vaccination , vaccination must postpone interval 4 week pass .
